title: Personal and Parental Status
description: Parents struggling with OUD face additional layers of stigma and risk:

list.title: Parental Rights
list.description: Admitting to a substance use disorder can result in child custody battles or losing parental rights.

list.title: Social Services Intervention
list.description: Fear of intervention by child protective services can deter parents from seeking help.

list.title: Judgment from Peers
list.description: Parents may face judgment from other parents, teachers, and community members.

summary: To support these individuals, itâ€™s vital to implement policies that protect parental rights while ensuring the safety and well-being of their children. Supportive and non-punitive approaches can help parents recover without the fear of losing their families.
